Fighters.Name: Eredin
Fighters.Text:
King of the Wild Hunt
While all of your Red Riders are defeated, Eredin is ENRAGED.

If Eredin is ENRAGED, add +1 to the value of your combat cards, and your move value is 3.

Fighters.Name: Red Rider
Fighters.Text:
King of the Wild Hunt
While all of your Red Riders are defeated, Eredin is ENRAGED.

If Eredin is ENRAGED, add +1 to the value of your combat cards, and your move value is 3.

Card.Name: Brutal Strike
Card.Text:
This card's effects cannot be canceled.
During combat: If your opponent's card has an IMMEDIATELY effect, ignore their card's value.

Card.Name: Backhand
Card.Text: After combat: Your opponent puts 1 random card from their hand on top of their deck. If Eredin is ENRAGED, they discard it instead.

Card.Name: Foul Purpose
Card.Text:
If Eredin is ENRAGED, you may play this card face-up to target a fighter in any space.
After combat: You may defeat a Red Rider to return this card to your hand.

Card.Name: Unyielding Hordes
Card.Text:
Immediately: Return a defeated Red Rider to any space.
During combat: Add +1 to this card's value for each other friendly fighter adjacent to the opposing fighter.

Card.Name: Wild Hunt
Card.Text: After combat: Deal 1 damage to each opposing fighter that is adjacent to at least one of your fighters. If Eredin is ENRAGED, deal 2 damage instead.

Card.Name: Skirmish
Card.Text: After combat: If you won the combat, choose one of the fighters in the combat and move them up to 2 spaces.

Card.Name: Icy Guile
Card.Text:
Immediately: If Eredin is ENRAGED, cancel all effects on your opponent's card.
During combat: You may defeat a Red Rider to ignore the value of your opponent's card.

Card.Name: Portal Defense
Card.Text:
Immediately: Eredin swaps spaces with an adjacent friendly fighter. That fighter is now the defender.
After combat: If Eredin is ENRAGED, draw 2 cards.

Card.Name: Implacable
Card.Text:
If Eredin is ENRAGED, you may play this card as an attack.
During combat: You may BOOST this card.

Card.Name: Might Of The Aen Elle
Card.Text: Draw 1 card. Gain 1 action. [ONGOING]: Eredin does not take damage except combat damage or from exhaustion. Discard this card at the end of your turn if you didn't attack.

Card.Name: Close For The Kill
Card.Text: Draw 2 cards. Move each of your fighters up to 3 spaces each. They may move through opposing fighters.
